body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps               Yosemite National Park   Download a simple park map (highlighting campgrounds) [2 MB PDF] [100 kb JPG]  Download the official park map [11 MB PDF] Topographic maps for the entire park             Yosemite Valley View a full-sized version of this map [300 kb PDF]           California  View a more detailed, zoomable map of California       A variety of digital map files is available via the NPS Data Store. Some brochures also have maps (including hiking maps for some areas of the park).
title: Yosemite National Park: Maps
